summary: "Blade Runner 2049" is a 2017 sci-fi movie directed by Denis Villeneuve, following the 1982 original. Ryan Gosling plays K, a blade runner who discovers a secret that could change the world. Harrison Ford returns as Rick Deckard. The film faced licensing challenges before finally getting made. It was well-received by critics but didn't make much money. Despite this, it won several awards, including Oscars for Best Cinematography and Best Visual Effects. A TV series sequel, "Blade Runner 2099," is being developed.
title: Blade Runner 2049
